title: Ticket #805: Starter should use DaemonCore signal interface
description:
The Starter rolls its own code to send signals to other processes. This duplicated work that DaemonCore can do, and provides another possibility for bugs (see the first comment at #706 for exactly such an example).

Task: review the Starter's code to do this and DaemonCore's. Merge any functionality needed by the Starter's version that's not in DaemonCore into DaemonCore. Change the Starter to use DaemonCore's implementation.

Assigned to psilord, whose only task is to completely replace what I've written here with a better summary based on his deeper understanding the of the situation.
